price: Kuma lalle ne, wannan al'ummarku ce, al'umma guda, kuma Nĩ, Ubangijinku ne, sai ku bĩ Ni da taƙawa.*
arabic: وَإِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱتَّقُونِ
footnotes: * Taƙawa, ita ce bautawa Allah da abin da Ya yi umurni a bauta Masa, a kan harshenAnnabinsa na zamaninsa. Yanzu bãbu taƙawa sai a cikin Musulunci kawai.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-ittaqūni
